Module jGame
Package jGame.core.ui.hud

Class Constraints

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.ui.hud.Constraints
public class Constraints
extends java.lang.Object
Display constraints to a UIHudElement.
Since:
1.1.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int BOTTOM  
    static int CENTER_HORIZONTAL_CONSTRAINT
    The constraint code for centering elements horizontally.
    static int CENTER_POINT_CONSTRAINT
    The constraint code for centering elements horizontally and vertically.
    static int CENTER_VERTICAL_CONSTRAINT
    The constraint code for centering elements vertically.
    private UIHudElement constrainedElement  
    private int constraintType  
    private int[] constraintValues  
    static int FROM_BOTTOM_CONSTRAINT
    The constraint code for placing elements relative to the bottom-most border of the element's container, weather it be the window or another element.
    static int FROM_LEFT_CONSTRAINT
    The constraint code for placing elements relative to the left-most border of the element's container, weather it be the window or another element.
    static int FROM_RIGHT_CONSTRAINT
    The constraint code for placing elements relative to the right-most border of the element's container, weather it be the window or another element.
    static int FROM_TOP_CONSTRAINT
    The constraint code for placing elements relative to the top-most border of the element's container, weather it be the window or another element.
    static int LEFT  
    static int NONE
    The constraint code for no constraints, position is set by the client.
    static int RIGHT  
    static int TOP

      public static int NONE
      The constraint code for no constraints, position is set by the client.

    • CENTER_HORIZONTAL_CONSTRAINT

      public static int CENTER_HORIZONTAL_CONSTRAINT
      The constraint code for centering elements horizontally.

    • CENTER_VERTICAL_CONSTRAINT

      public static int CENTER_VERTICAL_CONSTRAINT
      The constraint code for centering elements vertically.
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • CENTER_POINT_CONSTRAINT

      public static int CENTER_POINT_CONSTRAINT
      The constraint code for centering elements horizontally and vertically. It is the same as a bitwise OR of CENTER_HORIZONTAL_CONSTRAINT and CENTER_VERTICAL_CONSTRAINT.
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • FROM_TOP_CONSTRAINT

      public static int FROM_TOP_CONSTRAINT
      The constraint code for placing elements relative to the top-most border of the element's container, weather it be the window or another element.
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • FROM_RIGHT_CONSTRAINT

      public static int FROM_RIGHT_CONSTRAINT
      The constraint code for placing elements relative to the right-most border of the element's container, weather it be the window or another element.
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • FROM_BOTTOM_CONSTRAINT

      public static int FROM_BOTTOM_CONSTRAINT
      The constraint code for placing elements relative to the bottom-most border of the element's container, weather it be the window or another element.
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • FROM_LEFT_CONSTRAINT

      public static int FROM_LEFT_CONSTRAINT
      The constraint code for placing elements relative to the left-most border of the element's container, weather it be the window or another element.
      Since:
      1.1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Constraints

      public Constraints​(UIHudElement constrainedElement, int constraintType, int[] constraintValues) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Constructs a Constraints object for the given constrainedElement, of type constraintType and using the values in contraintValues
      Parameters:
      constrainedElement - the element to constrain
      constraintType - the type of constraint to apply to the element
      constraintValues - the values to apply when constraining the object
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if constraintType is different from NONE and constraintValues is null
      Since:
      1.1.0

  • Method Details

    • BIT_MASK

      private static int BIT_MASK​(int i)

    • concat

      public static int concat​(int... constraintTypes)
      Constructs a given constraint type out of the supplied constraint codes.
      Parameters:
      constraintTypes - a variable number of constraints to constrain the element
      Returns:
      the code of the given constrain type
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • defaultFor

      public static Constraints defaultFor​(UIHudElement theElement)
      Returns the default constraints to apply to a UIHudElement.
      Parameters:
      theElement - the element to which the default constraints should be applied
      Returns:
      the default constraints for the given element
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • getXLocation

      public int getXLocation()
      Returns the x position of the constrained element, according to the applied constraints.
      Returns:
      the x location of the constrained element
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • getYLocation

      public int getYLocation()
      Returns the y position of the constrained element, according to the applied constraints.
